name: action
description: action to execute. Possible values are: create, close, tally, execute

name: nonceAccountId
description: Account id of a nonce account that is controlled by the turret signers and has min. 3.6 XLM. Required for create action.

name: proposalSecret
description: Secret key for proposal account. Required for create action.

name: proposalAccountId
description: Account id of the proposal account. Required for: close, tally and execute.

name: proposalLink
description: Link to Proposal Data Structure. Max 64 chars.

name: turretSigners
description: List of turret contract signers of the proposal account. Required for create.

name: daoTomlHost
description: Link to DAO address wich publishes <daoTomlHost>/.well-known/dao.toml. Required for create.
